verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in and told <S%H5046><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "My father <S%H1><s%> and my brothers, <S%H251><s%> with their flocks, <S%H6629><s%> their herds, <S%H1241><s%> and all that they own, <S%H935><s%> have come out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> and behold, <S%H776><s%> they are in the land of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>"
From <S%H7097><s%> among his brothers <S%H251><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> and presented <S%H3322><s%> them to <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "What is your occupation? <S%H4639><s%>" They said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "Your servants <S%H5650><s%> are shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> both we, <S%H1><s%> and our fathers."

They said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "We have come <S%H935><s%> to live <S%H1481><s%> as foreigners in the land, <S%H776><s%> for there is no pasture <S%H4829><s%> for your servants <S%H5650><s%>' flocks. <S%H6629><s%> For the famine <S%H7458><s%> is severe <S%H3515><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> Now therefore, <S%H5650><s%> please let your servants dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>"
Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Your father <S%H1><s%> and your brothers <S%H251><s%> have come to you. <S%H935><s%>

The land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is before you. <S%H6440><s%> Make <S%H3427><s%> your <S%H6440><s%> father <S%H1><s%> and your brothers <S%H251><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the best of the land. <S%H776><s%> Let them dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%> If you know <S%H3045><s%> any able men <S%H582><s%> among them, <S%H7760><s%> then put them <S%H7760><s%> in charge <S%H8269><s%> of my livestock. <S%H4735><s%>"

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and set him <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "How <S%H4100><s%> many are the days of the years of your life? <S%H3117><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "The days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of my pilgrimage <S%H4033><s%> are one hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%> Few <S%H4592><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%> have been the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of my life, <S%H2416><s%> and they have not attained <S%H5381><s%> to the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of my fathers <S%H1><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of their pilgrimage. <S%H4033><s%>"
Jacob <S%H3290><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> placed <S%H3427><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them a possession <S%H272><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the best <S%H4315><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Rameses, <S%H7486><s%> as Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> nourished <S%H3557><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and all of his father <S%H1><s%>'s household, <S%H1004><s%> with bread, <S%H3899><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to their families. <S%H2945><s%>

There was no bread <S%H3899><s%> in all the land; <S%H776><s%> for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> severe, <S%H3515><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> fainted <S%H3856><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the famine. <S%H7458><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gathered up <S%H3950><s%> all the money <S%H3701><s%> that was found <S%H4672><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> for the grain <S%H7668><s%> which they bought: <S%H7666><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> into Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>

When the money <S%H3701><s%> was all spent <S%H8552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> us bread, <S%H3899><s%> for why should we die <S%H4191><s%> in your presence? <S%H3701><s%> For our money fails. <S%H656><s%>"

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> me your livestock; <S%H4735><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you food for your livestock, <S%H4735><s%> if your money <S%H3701><s%> is gone. <S%H656><s%>"

They brought <S%H935><s%> their livestock <S%H4735><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> in exchange for the horses, <S%H5483><s%> and for the flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and for the <S%H4735><s%> herds, <S%H1241><s%> and for the donkeys: <S%H2543><s%> and he fed <S%H5095><s%> them with bread <S%H3899><s%> in exchange for all their livestock <S%H4735><s%> for that year. <S%H8141><s%>

When that year <S%H8141><s%> was ended, <S%H8552><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to him the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3582><s%> "We will not hide from my lord <S%H113><s%> how our money <S%H3701><s%> is all spent, <S%H8552><s%> and the herds <S%H4735><s%> of livestock <S%H929><s%> are my <S%H413><s%> lord <S%H113><s%>'s. There is nothing left <S%H7604><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of my lord, <S%H113><s%> but our bodies, <S%H1472><s%> and our lands. <S%H127><s%>

Why should we die <S%H4191><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> both we and our land? <S%H127><s%> Buy <S%H7069><s%> us and our land <S%H127><s%> for bread, <S%H3899><s%> and we and our land <S%H127><s%> will be servants <S%H5650><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> us seed, <S%H2233><s%> that we may live, <S%H2421><s%> and not die, <S%H4191><s%> and that the land <S%H127><s%> won't <S%H3456><s%> be desolate."

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> all the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> for every man <S%H376><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> his field, <S%H7704><s%> because the famine <S%H7458><s%> was severe <S%H2388><s%> on them, <S%H776><s%> and the land became Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s.

As for the people, <S%H5971><s%> he moved <S%H5674><s%> them to the cities <S%H5892><s%> from one end <S%H7097><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> even to the other end of it. <S%H7097><s%>

Only he <S%H7069><s%> didn't <S%H127><s%> buy the land of the priests, <S%H3548><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%> had a portion <S%H2706><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and ate <S%H398><s%> their portion <S%H2706><s%> which Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them. <S%H4376><s%> That is why they didn't sell their land. <S%H127><s%>

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Behold, <S%H7069><s%> I have bought you and your land <S%H127><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> for Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%> Behold, <S%H1887><s%> here is seed <S%H2233><s%> for you, <S%H2232><s%> and you shall sow the land. <S%H127><s%>

It will happen at the harvests, <S%H8393><s%> that you shall give <S%H5414><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> parts <S%H3027><s%> will be your own, <S%H2233><s%> for seed of the field, <S%H7704><s%> for your food, <S%H400><s%> for them of your households, <S%H1004><s%> and for food <S%H398><s%> for your little ones. <S%H2945><s%>"

They said, <S%H559><s%> "You have saved our lives! <S%H2421><s%> Let us find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord, <S%H113><s%> and we will be Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s servants. <S%H5650><s%>"

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> it a statute <S%H2706><s%> concerning the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> should have the fifth. <S%H2569><s%> Only the land <S%H127><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> alone didn't <S%H7535><s%> become Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s.

Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen; <S%H1657><s%> and they got themselves possessions <S%H270><s%> therein, <S%H6509><s%> and were fruitful, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> seventeen <S%H6240><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%> So the days of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> the years <S%H2416><s%> of his life, <S%H3967><s%> were one hundred forty <S%H705><s%> - seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

The time <S%H3117><s%> drew near <S%H7126><s%> that Israel <S%H3478><s%> must die, <S%H4191><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H4672><s%> "If now I have found favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> please put <S%H7760><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> under my thigh, <S%H3409><s%> and deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with me. <S%H6912><s%> Please don't bury me in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

but when I sleep <S%H7901><s%> with my fathers, <S%H1><s%> you shall carry <S%H5375><s%> me out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bury <S%H6912><s%> me in their burying place. <S%H6900><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "I will do <S%H6213><s%> as you have said. <S%H1697><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Swear <S%H7650><s%> to me, <S%H7650><s%>" and he swore to him. <S%H3478><s%> Israel bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself on the bed <S%H4296><s%>'s head. <S%H7218><s%>
